title: Meat Grinder
summaries: The Meat Grinder is a Hardmode crafting station used to craft Flesh Blocks and Lesion Blocks. It has a 1/200 (0.5%) chance of being dropped by several Crimson and (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) Corruption enemies.

Flesh and Lesion Blocks can be used as building materials, and crafted into flesh-/lesion-themed <linked>walls</linked> and <linked>furniture</linked> via the <linked>Decay Chamber</linked>/<linked>Flesh Cloning Vat</linked>. As a result, the Meat Grinder is of little use without them.
